Header Title

Header description text

Individual Edu Plus license request


Educational licenses are available to users with proven educational status. Please note that the free Edu Plus licenses available in this promotion period will expire on June 30, 2016.

If you have an email address at your educational institution, please ensure this is the address you use to login to Moovly. If not, you can change your email address here*.


About your Educational Institution


*If you don’t have an email address at your Educational Institute, please provide a link with an online proof of your educational status, such as a public LinkedIn page.
